name: Fingo Africa
headline: A neobank for Africa's 500 million youth
description:
Fingo is building a pan-African digital bank.

Today, most Africans pay 5-15% fees to transfer money to friends, family, or businesses - with Fingo these fees will be 90% cheaper. 

In 240 seconds, any young person will be able to access a full suite of financial services including personal, business, investment and savings accounts.

founders.name: Kiiru Muhoya, Founder
founders.description: Kiiru is the co-founder and CEO of Fingo Africa. Fingo is the first youth focused Pan-African Neo-Bank. Previously he was part of the team at Acorn Holdings, the largest private developer of real estate in East Africa, being the first Kenyan company to successfully list a bond on the London Stock Exchange. Kiiru is a Philosophy, Politics and Economics graduate from the University of Warwick.

founders.name: Ian Njuguna, Founder
founders.description:
Experienced technology founder. Engineered for over a decade, Built outdoor advertising automation allowing advertisers to upload their ads to digital billboards and pay digitally from their devices, and multiple other systems. (Think Instagram ads but on outdoor advertising)

Now Joining 3 others to build the largest Neobank for Africa at Fingo.

founders.name: Gitari Tirima, Founder
founders.description:
Trying to bring banking to the African youth!
Just a kid who loves interesting problems and creating viable solutions that will outlast me.

founders.name: James da Costa, Founder
founders.description:
Partner @ a16z focused on enterprise software.
YC S21 - Cofounder/ COO of Fingo.

## For those who dream big! Open your accountfor free in just 4 minutes.
# Get the best banking experience
Fingo Africa is a CBK regulated Product powered by
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce4a8070ce98cc346de059/65fa900de9fd22fb37f85606_ecobank-logo.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce4a8070ce98cc346de059/65fa981db3cc0c02919c302f_ecobank-mockup.jpg)
# PERSONAL ACCOUNT
## One account, multiple benefits for you
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63dd1b6aa39fcaf2a7846cc5/65f95fea7dbc57c1ece690e5_Transfers.svg)
# Transact with Fingo friends for free 
Say goodbye to transaction fees when you send and request from your Fingo friends
[More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce4a8070ce98cc346de059/65f944e1c4c55a7a9e011513_arrow__right--small.svg)](https://fingo.africa/</personal-account>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63dd1b6aa39fcaf2a7846cc5/65f960340606c697c27b42d1_award.svg)
# Improve your Finance Literacy as you play
Compete with your friends on trivia and embark on a fun-filled learning journey.
[More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce4a8070ce98cc346de059/65f944e1c4c55a7a9e011513_arrow__right--small.svg)](https://fingo.africa/</personal-account>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63dd1b6aa39fcaf2a7846cc5/65f9601aff5661997c483e18_pie-chart.svg)
# Take Control of your Finances with Budgeting
Set up personalised budget plans and monitor your spending easily.
[More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce4a8070ce98cc346de059/65f944e1c4c55a7a9e011513_arrow__right--small.svg)](https://fingo.africa/</personal-account>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63dd1b6aa39fcaf2a7846cc5/65f96183da8a6c56eb6e91c4_plant.svg)
# Grow your funds effortlessly
Unlock the power of your savings with competitive interest rates. Watch your money grow daily and reach your financial ambitions faster.
[More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce4a8070ce98cc346de059/65f944e1c4c55a7a9e011513_arrow__right--small.svg)](https://fingo.africa/</personal-account>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63dd1b6aa39fcaf2a7846cc5/65f961c91b19f54e6886d11e_Group%2019930.svg)
# Earn as you spend
Every transaction earns you Fingo Coins. Accumulate coins to unlock cashback boosters, exciting spins to win, and more!
[More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce4a8070ce98cc346de059/65f944e1c4c55a7a9e011513_arrow__right--small.svg)](https://fingo.africa/</personal-account>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63dd1b6aa39fcaf2a7846cc5/65f9620f5a488cf8d0be1b34_Bank%20Transfer.svg)
# Seamless local banking
Transfer money effortlessly to and from local banks. Manage your finances with ease within the Fingo ecosystem.
[More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce4a8070ce98cc346de059/65f944e1c4c55a7a9e011513_arrow__right--small.svg)](https://fingo.africa/</personal-account>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63dd1b6aa39fcaf2a7846cc5/65f96235af8a21006d926c10_calendar%201.svg)
# Direct salary deposits
Have your salary paid directly into your Fingo account. Simplify your finances and plan ahead with confidence.
[More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce4a8070ce98cc346de059/65f944e1c4c55a7a9e011513_arrow__right--small.svg)](https://fingo.africa/</personal-account>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63dd1b6aa39fcaf2a7846cc5/65f9624e2915e9e0163b62da_payment%201.svg)
# Ask and you shall receive
Request money from Fingo users or anyone with a link or QR code. Make splitting bills and collecting contributions easy.
[More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce4a8070ce98cc346de059/65f944e1c4c55a7a9e011513_arrow__right--small.svg)](https://fingo.africa/</personal-account>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63dd1b6aa39fcaf2a7846cc5/65f962643098590248bcc7d5_pie-chart.svg)

Dive deep into your financial habits. Track expenses, visualize spending trends, and make informed decisions to achieve your financial goals.
[More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce4a8070ce98cc346de059/65f944e1c4c55a7a9e011513_arrow__right--small.svg)](https://fingo.africa/</personal-account>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63dd1b6aa39fcaf2a7846cc5/65f95f9e64d10e77254f0079_smartphone.svg)

Instantly transfer money between Fingo and any M-PESA account. Experience the convenience of quick mobile transfers.
[More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce4a8070ce98cc346de059/65f944e1c4c55a7a9e011513_arrow__right--small.svg)](https://fingo.africa/</personal-account>)

generated_description:
Fingo Africa is a pan-African neobank launched in 2020, aiming to revolutionize banking for Africa's youth, particularly targeting the 500 million young people across the continent. Founded in Nairobi, Kenya, and part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, Fingo addresses a critical pain point: high money transfer fees that currently range from 5% to 15%. By introducing its platform, Fingo promises to make these transfers up to 90% cheaper.

With an easy onboarding process that allows users to access a full suite of financial services—including personal, business, investment, and savings accounts—in just about 240 seconds, Fingo is designed for efficiency and user-friendliness. The company's small but dedicated team of eight employees is focused on creating a dynamic banking experience that empowers users to manage their finances better.

Fingo's platform not only facilitates peer-to-peer transfers among users without transaction fees but also offers tools for budgeting, savings, and financial literacy through engaging trivia games. Users earn Fingo Coins with each transaction, encouraging responsible spending and providing opportunities for rewards.

The bank has features tailored for various financial needs. There are plans for both personal and corporate accounts, each equipped with specific tools for managing finances effectively. Notably, the Interest-Earning Savings account promises competitive annual rates of up to 15%, underscoring Fingo's commitment to enhancing savings for its community.

In collaboration with Ecobank, Fingo is regulated by the Central Bank of Kenya (CBK), elevating user trust and ensuring compliance with financial regulations. With ambitions to grow beyond 100,000 clients towards the goal of serving 100 million, Fingo is not just about banking; it is about building a community where young Africans can thrive financially.

To learn more about Fingo Africa, visit their website at [fingo.africa](https://fingo.africa).
